name: NHS service manual design system
description:
Recreating the NHS service manual design system using auto layout, variants, interactive components and commonly used patterns.




This file also features a number of templates including:




Home page

Landing pages

Mini-hub

Global content pages

Basic forms

A-Z listing

Search listing



I hope this helps people to create accessible NHS products based on the service manual.




Please feel free to get in touch to request updates or comment where things could be improved.
